titles.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9: The JoJoLands
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9: The JoJoLands

title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9: The JoJoLands
title_english: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9: The JoJoLands
title_japanese: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands
synopsis:
On the Hawaiian Islands, siblings Dragona and Jodio Joestar commit petty crimes to provide aid for their ailing mother Barbara Ann. Under the orders of Meryl May Qi, both a crime lord and their high school principal, the siblings work alongside fellow teenagers Usagi Alohaoe and Paco Laburantes. Together, the gang engages in outright robbery, fraudulent activity, and other schemes to rip off unsuspecting tourists and civilians.

Fifteen-year-old Jodio admires his older brother's strong sense of identity and his mother's incredible work ethic, but there is a darkness within him, one characterized by violent outbursts that he carries out with a cold stoicism. Diagnosed as a sociopath, Jodio is quick to brutalize those who threaten his loved ones. His one objective is to make money by any means necessary, both to support his family and to become filthy rich in his own right.

On one particular heist, the gang robs manga artist Rohan Kishibe of a seemingly ordinary lava rock. However, they soon find that the rock draws any object of high value that it touches to its wielder, no matter the distance or bizarre chain of circumstances it takes to get there. With this new power in hand, Jodio and his allies set out to become wealthier than they ever dreamed possible.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9: The JoJoLands ranked 15th in the 2024 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for the Male Readers division.
